summary: Card detail modal fails to load card comments table
details: Clicking into any card now shows a red banner error `Could not find the table 'public.card_comments' in the schema cache`. The Supabase project is missing the card_comments table that backs the new chat feature. Create the table (id UUID default uuid_generate_v4, card_id UUID FK to cards, body text, author text, created_at timestamptz default now) and refresh the schema cache, or disable comment fetching until table exists.
resolution: Added database/card_comments.sql migration for Supabase and surfaced a friendly in-app error instructing operators to run it when the table is missing.
